articles.content:

articles.title: Stephen Kenny: FAI closes probe into video shown before England friendly after manager's explanation - Sky Sports
articles.description: The FAI has accepted Stephen Kenny's explanation into why he showed a controversial video ahead of the team's game against England and has closed its investigation.
